Q_DESC:
Determine the number of consecutive integer numbers which when added together will give a value equal to or just less than a maximum value that the user gives. 
Hint: The number of integers starting from 1 that would add up to maximum value 210 is 20.  That is, 1+ 2 + 3 + 4 + ... + 20 = 210
Sample input 
Enter the max. value :10
Out put
1 + 2 + 3 + 4 = 10 
Total no.of integers : 4
